## Discussion

The default value for the service status is [doc://com.apple.pushtotalk/documentation/PushToTalk/PTServiceStatus/ready]. Set the appropriate service status if your network connection experiences an issue. The system reflects your service status in the user interface.

# setServiceStatus(_:channelUUID:completionHandler:)

**Instance Method**

Sets the service connection status.

## Declaration

```swift
func setServiceStatus(_ status: PTServiceStatus, channelUUID: UUID, completionHandler: (((any Error)?) -> Void)? = nil)
```

```swift
func setServiceStatus(_ status: PTServiceStatus, channelUUID: UUID) async throws
```

## Parameters

- **status**: The service status.
- **channelUUID**: The channel identifier.
- **completionHandler**: The completion handler.



## Discussion



The default value for the service status is [doc://com.apple.pushtotalk/documentation/PushToTalk/PTServiceStatus/ready]. Set the appropriate service status if your network connection experiences an issue. The system reflects your service status in the user interface.
title: setServiceStatus(_:channelUUID:completionHandler:)
